Text: sorry about the double post, the original was missing a song, and there was no playlist file.  so this torrent is the official one :)

I just watched a live video from Chamillionaire, and he really said something that really got me.  He said, he doesn't listen to rap anymore, simply because its so hard to listen to.  It has no emotion.  He thinks drake does good because drake makes his music smooth.  So, when you listen to this album, take it in as smooth.  Don't listen to just the beats, listen to my lyrics too.  Just a little bit of talk I had to post lol
